body_html:
I believe that spark has a to_iterable operation:
http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/pyspark.html#pyspark.RDD.toLocalIterator

pyspark has the tools available to preprocess the data in an RDD before returning it to the current python process, use this command to return a random subset of the current RDD:
http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/pyspark.html#pyspark.RDD.sample

body:
I believe that spark has a to_iterable operation: 
http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/pyspark.html#pyspark.RDD.toLocalIterator

pyspark has the tools available to preprocess the data in an RDD before returning it to the current python process, use this command to return a random subset of the current RDD:
http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/pyspark.html#pyspark.RDD.sample
